Detailed Description

mgTLisectsList is a proprietry class for Face tessellation.

mgTLisectsList holds all the necessary mgTLisects along u or v in the parameter space of a face. This class is to eliminate the same value's isect_1D computation. Once isect_1D is invoked for some u or v value, the intersections are hold in this class.

Member Function Documentation

issListItr mgTLisectsList::get ( mgTLparameter &  param,
double  tin,
size_t  kcod 
)

Search mgTLisects whose t()==tin.

If not found compute intersections and add one member of mgTLisects whose t() is tin. Function's return value is the iterator of the mgTLisects in mgTLisectsList.

Parameters:
param tessellation parameter.
tin face's parameter u or v according to kcod.
kcod Coordinate kind, =0: tin is u value, =1: tin is v value.

intersections of u=m_t(or v=m_t) and the non-perimeter loop parts of the face's loops.
